alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 10 at 8:07PM PST until January 13 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches possible. * WHERE...In Oregon, Lower Columbia. In Washington, I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County
